thread.title: Video: Taylor Swift Performs With Ellie Goulding at Texas Concert
thread.title_full: Video: Taylor Swift Performs With Ellie Goulding at Texas Concert

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Video: Taylor Swift Performs With Ellie Goulding at Texas Concert
text:
Comments The two BFFs joined forces for Goulding's hit 'Love Me Like You Do' from the 'Fifty Shades of Grey' soundtrack during the show in Arlington over the weekend. 
Taylor Swift reunited with one of her "Bad Blood" music video co-stars at her recent concert in Texas. The 25-year-old superstar brought out BFF Ellie Goulding during the show at Arlington's AT&T Stadium on Saturday night, October 17. Swift introduced Goulding to the crowd of 60,000 people at the venue as one of her "really, really, really good friends." The British songbird later came out onstage in all-black and performed her contribution to the " Fifty Shades of Grey " soundtrack, "Love Me Like You Do". Later that night, Swift shared several Instagram photos and videos taken during the performance. "Catastrophe & Destructa X," she captioned one photo, referring to their respective character from the "Bad Blood" video. One short clip came with a part of the song's lyrics, "What are you waiting for?" A photo posted by Taylor Swift (@taylorswift) on Oct 17, 2015 at 11:34pm PDT A video posted by Taylor Swift (@taylorswift) on Oct 17, 2015 at 11:31pm PDT Goulding is not the only member of Swift's squad to have been invited to the ongoing North American leg of her "1989" world tour. The "Shake It Off" hitmaker has also been joined by Selena Gomez , Hailee Steinfeld and Gigi Hadid among others in the past.
